ygData.subject: RE: Dragoon Dirk (STATS Shown Spoilers???)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I got dual wield and made a study of wep stats: Wep	ratio	dmg	dly	weight	where to get Crookstinger	.190	4	21	?	poison effect Lesser Fay Crysknife	.190	4	21
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I got dual wield and made a study of wep stats:

Wep ratio dmg dly weight where to get
Crookstinger .190 4 21 ? poison effect Lesser Fay
Crysknife .190 4 21 5 Paw
Combine Scim .208 5 24 5 buy off gypsys
Coral Trident .210 8 38 4.5 dex +5
Combine LS .214 6 28 5 have one
Combine Rapier .217 5 23 ?? gypsys
Pugius .238 5 21 2.5 Unrest
Gladius .241 7 29 2.5 Unrest
Barbed Leather Whip .250 7 28 6 Najena
Obsidian Scim .259 7 27 5 +6 agi ???
Dragoon Dirk .260 6 23 2.5 have one lore
Jambiya .269 7 26 5 sand giant in oasis/n ro Bard, Ench
& Wiz can equip - I wonder if I can nod him while you guys nuke him?
Ashenwood Short Spear .272 6 22 5 haste effect Najena
Fanged Skull Stiletto .545 12 22 5 Kedge Keep (I guess
this is the uber wep)

Formatted:

Wep ratio dmg dly weight where to get
Crookstinger .190 4 21 ? poison effect Lesser Fay

Crysknife .190 4 21 5 Paw
Combine Scim .208 5 24 5 buy off gypsys
Coral Trident .210 8 38 4.5 dex +5
Combine LS .214 6 28 5 have one
Combine Rapier .217 5 23 ?? gypsys
Pugius .238 5 21 2.5 Unrest
Gladius .241 7 29 2.5 Unrest
Barbed Leather Whip .250 7 28 6 Najena
Obsidian Scim .259 7 27 5 +6 agi ???
Dragoon Dirk .260 6 23 2.5 have one lore
Jambiya .269 7 26 5 sand giant in oasis/n ro Bard, Ench
& Wiz can equip - I wonder if I can nod him while you guys nuke him?
Ashenwood Short Spear .272 6 22 5 haste effect Najena

Fanged Skull Stiletto .545 12 22 5 Kedge Keep (I guess
this is the uber wep)



-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach [mailto:mroach@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 4:25 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk

From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>

I finally picked up a Pugius Dagger which is Damage 5, 21
delay, hits magic
creatures, to use with my Dragoon dirk in my off-hand. Not
a bad weapon at
all, the speed rating is incredible, and if you compare the
speed and damage
of the combine LS to the Pugius, I think it is a pretty
close toss-up as to
which is better. Plus for the bard I think the 2-dagger
look and the quick
dual-wield "pierce-pierce-pierce-pierce" is awesome. Next I
need get myself
an obsidian shard...

Faras Tar'Linedhel



> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 3:43 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk
>
>
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> Off topic just for your benefit. Actually it is not that
> much off topic
> since the bad is a rogue-type class and notorious for
using dagger and
> piercing weapons (thats why bards have some thieving
abilites).
>
> Combine Longsword: Damage 6, 28 delay, hits magical
creatures
> Dragoon Dirk: Damage 6, 23 delay, +2 dexterity, +3
magic.
>
> Hands down Dirk is way better.
>
>
> > ----------
> > From: Blair, Keith (Keith
Blair)[SMTP:kblair@...]
> > Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 2:59 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk

> >
> > > Yes, but this particular dagger is better than a
> > > combine longsword. Same damage, better speed, and
> > > buffs as well. probably less weight, too.
> > >
> > > Quite a bargain
> >
> > I bought my combine for 30pp.. Someone wants 75pp for
the
> dagger.. I'm
> > sorry
> > I can't recall the exact specs on the Dirk at the
moment,
> but I don't
> > believe they're worth 45pp (or even 20+pp if you had
bought
> the CLS from a
> > gypsy for 50pp). But then again, that's just my opinion.
I
> don't want to
> > start an off topic thread on weapons and such. =)
